title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
simple_desc: Miles Morales catapults across the Multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its very existence. When the heroes clash on how to handle a new threat, Miles must redefine what it means to be a hero.
stars: ['Shameik Moore', 'Hailee Steinfeld', 'Brian Tyree Henry', 'Luna Lauren Velez']

title: Spirited Away
simple_desc: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches and spirits, a world where humans are changed into beasts.

title: The Lion King
simple_desc: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

title: Grave of the Fireflies
simple_desc: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
simple_desc: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

title: Your Name.
simple_desc: Two teenagers share a profound, magical connection upon discovering they are swapping bodies. Things manage to become even more complicated when the boy and girl decide to meet in person.

title: Coco
simple_desc: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

title: WALL·E
simple_desc: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

title: Toy Story
simple_desc: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's bedroom.

title: Up
simple_desc: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

title: Toy Story 3
simple_desc: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

title: Princess Mononoke
simple_desc: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

title: Finding Nemo
simple_desc: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

title: Howl's Moving Castle
simple_desc: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

title: Demon Slayer the Movie: Mugen Train
simple_desc: After his family was brutally murdered and his sister turned into a demon, Tanjiro Kamado's journey as a demon slayer began. Tanjiro and his comrades embark on a new mission aboard the Mugen Train, on track to despair.

title: Klaus
simple_desc: A simple act of kindness always sparks another, even in a frozen, faraway place. When Smeerensburg's new postman, Jesper, befriends toymaker Klaus, their gifts melt an age-old feud and deliver a sleigh full of holiday traditions.

title: Ratatouille
simple_desc: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant.

title: Inside Out
simple_desc: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

title: How to Train Your Dragon
simple_desc: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

title: Monsters, Inc.
simple_desc: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, two monsters realize things may not be what they think.

title: My Neighbor Totoro
simple_desc: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

title: The Iron Giant
simple_desc: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

title: A Silent Voice: The Movie
simple_desc: A young man is ostracized by his classmates after he bullies a deaf girl to the point where she moves away. Years later, he sets off on a path for redemption.

title: Mary and Max
simple_desc: A tale of friendship between two unlikely pen pals: Mary, a lonely, eight-year-old girl living in the suburbs of Melbourne, and Max, a forty-four-year old, severely obese man living in New York.

title: Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion
simple_desc: Concurrent theatrical ending of the TV series Neon Genesis Evangelion (1995).

title: Wolf Children
simple_desc: After her werewolf lover unexpectedly dies in an accident while hunting for food for their children, a young woman must find ways to raise the werewolf son and daughter that she had with him while keeping their trait hidden from society.

title: Zootopia
simple_desc: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

title: The Incredibles
simple_desc: While trying to lead a quiet suburban life, a family of undercover superheroes are forced into action to save the world.
stars: ['Craig T. Nelson', 'Samuel L. Jackson', 'Holly Hunter', 'Jason Lee']

title: Aladdin
simple_desc: A kind-hearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

title: Beauty and the Beast
simple_desc: A prince cursed to spend his days as a hideous monster sets out to regain his humanity by earning a young woman's love.

title: Akira
simple_desc: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath who can only be stopped by a teenager, his gang of biker friends and a group of psychics.

title: Soul
simple_desc: After landing the gig of a lifetime, a New York jazz pianist suddenly finds himself trapped in a strange land between Earth and the afterlife.

title: Perfect Blue
simple_desc: A pop singer gives up her career to become an actress, but she slowly goes insane when she starts being stalked by an obsessed fan and what seems to be a ghost of her past.

title: Castle in the Sky
simple_desc: A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle.

title: Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind
simple_desc: Warrior and pacifist Princess Nausicaä desperately struggles to prevent two warring nations from destroying themselves and their dying planet.

title: I Want to Eat Your Pancreas
simple_desc: A high school student discovers one of his classmates, Sakura Yamauchi, is suffering from a terminal illness. This secret brings the two together, as she lives out her final moments.

title: Wolfwalkers
simple_desc: A young apprentice hunter and her father journey to Ireland to help wipe out the last wolf pack. But everything changes when she befriends a free-spirited girl from a mysterious tribe rumored to transform into wolves by night.

title: The Tale of The Princess Kaguya
simple_desc: Found inside a shining stalk of bamboo by an old bamboo cutter and his wife, a tiny girl grows rapidly into an exquisite young lady. The mysterious young princess enthralls all who encounter her, but ultimately she must confront her fate, the punishment for her crime.

title: Song of the Sea
simple_desc: Ben, a young Irish boy, and his little sister Saoirse, a girl who can turn into a seal, go on an adventure to free the fairies and save the spirit world.

title: Persepolis
simple_desc: A precocious and outspoken Iranian girl grows up during the Islamic Revolution.

title: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish
simple_desc: When Puss in Boots discovers that his passion for adventure has taken its toll and he has burned through eight of his nine lives, he launches an epic journey to restore them by finding the mythical Last Wish.

title: Fantastic Mr. Fox
simple_desc: An urbane fox cannot resist returning to his farm raiding ways and then must help his community survive the farmers' retaliation.

title: Shrek
simple_desc: A mean lord exiles fairytale creatures to the swamp of a grumpy ogre, who must go on a quest and rescue a princess for the lord in order to get his land back.

title: Toy Story 2
simple_desc: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends set out on a rescue mission to save Woody before he becomes a museum toy property with his roundup gang Jessie, Prospector, and Bullseye.

title: Ghost in the Shell
simple_desc: A cyborg policewoman and her partner hunt a mysterious and powerful hacker called the Puppet Master.

title: The Nightmare Before Christmas
simple_desc: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but his attempts to bring Christmas to his home causes confusion.

title: Big Hero 6
simple_desc: A special bond develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who together team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

title: Isle of Dogs
simple_desc: Set in Japan, Isle of Dogs follows a boy's odyssey in search of his lost dog.

title: Kiki's Delivery Service
simple_desc: A young witch, on her mandatory year of independent life, finds fitting into a new community difficult while she supports herself by running an air courier service.

title: How to Train Your Dragon 2
simple_desc: When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen 0
simple_desc: Yuta Okkotsu, a high schooler who gains control of an extremely powerful Cursed Spirit and gets enrolled in the Tokyo Prefectural Jujutsu High School by Jujutsu Sorcerers to help him control his power and keep an eye on him.

title: Whisper of the Heart
simple_desc: A love story between a girl who loves reading books, and a boy who has previously checked out all of the library books she chooses.

title: Loving Vincent
simple_desc: In a story depicted in oil painted animation, a young man comes to the last hometown of painter Vincent van Gogh to deliver the troubled artist's final letter and ends up investigating his final days there.

title: Ninja Scroll
simple_desc: A vagabond swordsman is aided by a kunoichi and a spy in battling a demonic clan of killers - led by a ghost from his past - who are bent on overthrowing the Tokugawa Shogunate.

title: Batman: Mask of the Phantasm
simple_desc: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.
directors: ['Eric Radomski', 'Kevin Altieri', 'Boyd Kirkland', 'Frank Paur', 'Dan Riba', 'Bruce Timm']

title: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie
simple_desc: A terrorist explosion releases a deadly virus on the masses, and it's up to the bounty-hunting Bebop crew to catch the cold-blooded culprit.

title: Tokyo Godfathers
simple_desc: On Christmas Eve, three homeless people living on the streets of Tokyo discover a newborn baby among the trash and set out to find its parents.

title: Millennium Actress
simple_desc: A TV interviewer and his cameraman meet a former actress and travel through her memories and career.

title: My Life as a Zucchini
simple_desc: After losing his mother, a young boy is sent to an orphanage with other orphans his age where he begins to learn the meaning of trust and true love.

title: Ernest & Celestine
simple_desc: The story of an unlikely friendship between a bear, Ernest, and a young mouse named Celestine.

title: Tangled
simple_desc: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.

title: Coraline
simple_desc: An adventurous 11-year-old girl finds another world that is a strangely idealized version of her frustrating home, but it has sinister secrets.

title: The Lego Movie
simple_desc: An ordinary LEGO construction worker, thought to be the prophesied as "special", is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil tyrant from gluing the LEGO universe into eternal stasis.

title: Toy Story 4
simple_desc: When a new toy called "Forky" joins Woody and the gang, a road trip alongside old and new friends reveals how big the world can be for a toy.

title: Wreck-It Ralph
simple_desc: A video game villain wants to be a hero and sets out to fulfill his dream, but his quest brings havoc to the whole arcade where he lives.

title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
simple_desc: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

title: Paprika
simple_desc: When a machine that allows therapists to enter their patients' dreams is stolen, all hell breaks loose. Only a young female therapist, Paprika, can stop it.

title: South Park: Bigger, Longer & Uncut
simple_desc: When Stan Marsh and his friends go see an R-rated movie, they start cursing and their parents think that Canada is to blame.

title: Fantastic Planet
simple_desc: On a faraway planet where blue giants rule, oppressed humanoids rebel against their machine-like leaders.

title: The Wind Rises
simple_desc: A look at the life of Jiro Horikoshi, the man who designed Japanese fighter planes during World War II.

title: Fantasia
simple_desc: A collection of animated interpretations of great works of Western classical music, ranging from the abstract to depictions of mythology and fantasy, and settings including the prehistoric, supernatural and sacred.
directors: ['James Algar', 'Samuel Armstrong', 'Ford Beebe Jr.', 'Norman Ferguson', 'David Hand', 'Jim Handley', 'T. Hee', 'Wilfred Jackson', 'Hamilton Luske', 'Bill Roberts', 'Paul Satterfield', 'Ben Sharpsteen']

title: Kubo and the Two Strings
simple_desc: A young boy named Kubo must locate a magical suit of armour worn by his late father in order to defeat a vengeful spirit from the past.

title: Porco Rosso
simple_desc: In 1930s Italy, a veteran World War I pilot is cursed to look like an anthropomorphic pig.

title: Waking Life
simple_desc: A man shuffles through a dream meeting various people and discussing the meanings and purposes of the universe.

title: The Little Prince
simple_desc: A little girl lives in a very grown-up world with her mother, who tries to prepare her for it. Her neighbor, the Aviator, introduces the girl to an extraordinary world where anything is possible, the world of the Little Prince.

title: When Marnie Was There
simple_desc: Due to 12 y.o. Anna's asthma, she's sent to stay with relatives of her guardian in the Japanese countryside. She likes to be alone, sketching. She befriends Marnie. Who is the mysterious, blonde Marnie.

title: The Breadwinner
simple_desc: In 2001, Afghanistan is under the control of the Taliban. When her father is captured, a determined young girl disguises herself as a boy in order to provide for her family.

title: The Triplets of Belleville
simple_desc: When her grandson is kidnapped during the Tour de France, Madame Souza and her beloved pooch Bruno team up with the Belleville Sisters--an aged song-and-dance team from the days of Fred Astaire--to rescue him.

title: The Girl Who Leapt Through Time
simple_desc: A high-school girl named Makoto acquires the power to travel back in time, and decides to use it for her own personal benefits. Little does she know that she is affecting the lives of others just as much as she is her own.

title: Dragon Ball Super: Broly
simple_desc: Goku and Vegeta encounter Broly, a Saiyan warrior unlike any fighter they've faced before.

title: The Little Mermaid
simple_desc: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain in an attempt to become human and win a prince's love.
stars: ['Jodi Benson', 'Samuel E. Wright', 'Rene Auberjonois', 'Christopher Daniel Barnes']

title: Moana
simple_desc: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the Demigod Maui reaches Moana's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the Demigod to set things right.

title: Incredibles 2
simple_desc: The Incredibles family takes on a new mission which involves a change in family roles: Bob Parr (Mr. Incredible) must manage the house while his wife Helen (Elastigirl) goes out to save the world.

title: Guillermo del Toro's Pinocchio
simple_desc: A father's wish magically brings a wooden boy to life in Italy, giving him a chance to care for the child.

title: Mulan
simple_desc: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

title: Kung Fu Panda
simple_desc: To everyone's surprise, including his own, Po, an overweight, clumsy panda, is chosen as protector of the Valley of Peace. His suitability will soon be tested as the valley's arch-enemy is on his way.

title: Despicable Me
simple_desc: When a criminal mastermind uses a trio of orphan girls as pawns for a grand scheme, he finds their love is profoundly changing him for the better.

title: The Mitchells vs the Machines
simple_desc: A quirky, dysfunctional family's road trip is upended when they find themselves in the middle of the robot apocalypse and suddenly become humanity's unlikeliest last hope.

title: The Jungle Book
simple_desc: Bagheera the Panther and Baloo the Bear have a difficult time trying to convince a boy to leave the jungle for human civilization.

title: Ponyo
simple_desc: A five-year-old boy develops a relationship with Ponyo, a young goldfish princess who longs to become a human after falling in love with him.

title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
simple_desc: Exiled into the dangerous forest by her wicked stepmother, a princess is rescued by seven dwarf miners who make her part of their household.
directors: ['William Cottrell', 'David Hand', 'Wilfred Jackson', 'Larry Morey', 'Perce Pearce', 'Ben Sharpsteen']

title: The Secret World of Arrietty
simple_desc: The Clock family are four-inch-tall people who live anonymously in another family's residence, borrowing simple items to make their home. Life changes for the Clocks when their teenage daughter Arrietty is discovered.

title: Watership Down
simple_desc: Hoping to escape destruction by human developers and save their community, a colony of rabbits, led by Hazel and Fiver, seek out a safe place to set up a new warren.

title: Vampire Hunter D: Bloodlust
simple_desc: A legendary dhampir competes with a motley family of bounty hunters to return a young woman, who has been seemingly abducted by a vampire, to her family.

title: Only Yesterday
simple_desc: A twenty-seven-year-old office worker travels to the countryside while reminiscing about her childhood in Tokyo.

title: Evangelion: 1.0 You Are (Not) Alone
simple_desc: The fate of the world is threatened by seemingly monstrous entities known as Angels. NERV is an organisation set up to counter this threat and it is up to young pilots to protect Earth but exactly what are the real motives behind NERV?

title: The Boy and the Beast
simple_desc: When a young orphaned boy living on the streets of Shibuya stumbles upon a fantastic world of beasts, he's taken in by a gruff warrior beast looking for an apprentice.

title: Ice Age
simple_desc: The story revolves around sub-zero heroes: a woolly mammoth, a saber-toothed tiger, a sloth and a prehistoric combination of a squirrel and rat, known as Scrat.

title: Robin Hood
simple_desc: The story of the legendary British outlaw portrayed with the characters as anthropomorphic animals.

title: Weathering with You
simple_desc: Set during a period of exceptionally rainy weather, high-school boy Hodaka Morishima runs away from his troubled rural home to Tokyo and befriends an orphan girl who can manipulate the weather.

title: The Secret of NIMH
simple_desc: To save her ill son, a field mouse must seek the aid of a colony of rats, with whom she has a deeper link than she suspected.

title: Pinocchio
simple_desc: A living puppet, with the help of a cricket as his conscience, must prove himself worthy to become a real boy.
directors: ['Norman Ferguson', 'T. Hee', 'Wilfred Jackson', 'Jack Kinney', 'Hamilton Luske', 'Bill Roberts', 'Ben Sharpsteen']

title: The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
simple_desc: Wallace and his loyal dog, Gromit, set out to discover the mystery behind the garden sabotage that plagues their village and threatens the annual giant vegetable growing contest.

title: 5 Centimeters per Second
simple_desc: Told in three interconnected segments, we follow a young man named Takaki through his life as cruel winters, cold technology, and finally, adult obligations and responsibility converge to test the delicate petals of love.

title: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
simple_desc: In this collection of animated shorts based on the stories and characters by A.A. Milne, Winnie the Pooh, a honey-loving teddy bear, embarks on some eccentric adventures.

title: The Secret of Kells
simple_desc: A young boy in a remote medieval outpost under siege from barbarian raids is beckoned to adventure when a celebrated master illuminator arrives with an ancient book, brimming with secret wisdom and powers.

title: The Red Turtle
simple_desc: A man is shipwrecked on a deserted island and encounters a red turtle, which changes his life.

title: I Lost My Body
simple_desc: A story of Naoufel, a young man who is in love with Gabrielle. In another part of town, a severed hand escapes from a dissection lab, determined to find its body again.

title: The Illusionist
simple_desc: A French illusionist finds himself out of work and travels to Scotland, where he meets a young woman. Their ensuing adventure changes both their lives forever.

title: Stewie Griffin: The Untold Story
simple_desc: The maniacal baby of the Griffin family, Stewie, meets his future self. In doing this he discovers that his future image is not what he has anticipated because of a near death experience.

title: Sing 2
simple_desc: Buster Moon and his friends must persuade reclusive rock star Clay Calloway to join them for the opening of a new show.

title: Frozen
simple_desc: When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice to curse her home in infinite winter, her sister Anna teams up with a mountain man, his playful reindeer, and a snowman to change the weather condition.

title: Luca
simple_desc: On the Italian Riviera, an unlikely but strong friendship grows between a human being and a sea monster disguised as a human.

title: The Emperor's New Groove
simple_desc: Emperor Kuzco is turned into a llama by his ex-administrator Yzma, and must now regain his throne with the help of Pacha, the gentle llama herder.

title: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
simple_desc: When Hiccup discovers Toothless isn't the only Night Fury, he must seek "The Hidden World", a secret Dragon Utopia before a hired tyrant named Grimmel finds it first.

title: Onward
simple_desc: In a magical world full of technological advances, elven brothers Ian and Barley Lightfoot set out on an adventure to resurrect their late father for a day.

title: The Land Before Time
simple_desc: An orphaned brontosaurus teams up with other young dinosaurs in order to reunite with their families in a valley.

title: The Garden of Words
simple_desc: A 15-year-old boy and 27-year-old woman find an unlikely friendship one rainy day in the Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden.

title: From Up on Poppy Hill
simple_desc: A group of Yokohama teens look to save their school's clubhouse from the wrecking ball in preparations for the 1964 Tokyo Olympics.

title: Yellow Submarine
simple_desc: The Beatles agree to accompany Captain Fred in his yellow submarine and go to Pepperland to free it from the music-hating Blue Meanies.

title: Summer Wars
simple_desc: A student tries to fix a problem he accidentally caused in OZ, a digital world, while pretending to be the fiancé of his friend at her grandmother's 90th birthday.

title: Ghost in the Shell 2: Innocence
simple_desc: In the year 2032, Batô, a cyborg detective for the anti-terrorist unit Public Security Section 9, investigates the case of a female robot--one created solely for sexual pleasure--who slaughtered her owner.

title: Hercules
simple_desc: The son of Zeus and Hera is stripped of his immortality as an infant and must become a true hero in order to reclaim it.

title: Lilo & Stitch
simple_desc: A young and parentless girl adopts a 'dog' from the local pound, completely unaware that it's supposedly a dangerous scientific experiment that's taken refuge on Earth and is now hiding from its creator and those who see it as a menace.

title: Raya and the Last Dragon
simple_desc: In a realm known as Kumandra, a re-imagined Earth inhabited by an ancient civilization, a warrior named Raya is determined to find the last dragon.

title: Shrek 2
simple_desc: Shrek and Fiona travel to the Kingdom of Far Far Away, where Fiona's parents are King and Queen, to celebrate their marriage. When they arrive, they find they are not as welcome as they thought they would be.

title: The Lego Batman Movie
simple_desc: A cooler-than-ever Bruce Wayne must deal with the usual suspects as they plan to rule Gotham City, while discovering that he has accidentally adopted a teenage orphan who wishes to become his sidekick.

title: Tarzan
simple_desc: A man raised by gorillas must decide where he really belongs when he discovers he is a human.

title: Finding Dory
simple_desc: Friendly but forgetful blue tang Dory begins a search for her long-lost parents and everyone learns a few things about the real meaning of family along the way.

title: Megamind
simple_desc: Evil genius Megamind finally defeats his do-gooder nemesis, Metro Man, but is left without a purpose in a superhero-free world.

title: The Adventures of Tintin
simple_desc: Intrepid reporter Tintin and Captain Haddock set off on a treasure hunt for a sunken ship commanded by Haddock's ancestor.

title: Peter Pan
simple_desc: Wendy and her brothers are whisked away to the magical world of Neverland with the hero of their stories, Peter Pan.

title: Despicable Me 2
simple_desc: When Gru, the world's most super-bad turned super-dad has been recruited by a team of officials to stop lethal muscle and a host of Gru's own, He has to fight back with new gadgetry, cars, and more minion madness.

title: Cinderella
simple_desc: When Cinderella's cruel stepmother prevents her from attending the Royal Ball, she gets some unexpected help from the lovable mice Gus and Jaq and from her Fairy Godmother.

title: Corpse Bride
simple_desc: When a shy groom practices his wedding vows in the inadvertent presence of a deceased young woman, she rises from the grave assuming he has married her.

title: The Last Unicorn
simple_desc: A beautiful unicorn sets out to learn if she truly is the last of her kind in this sparkling animated musical.

title: Lady and the Tramp
simple_desc: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

title: Alice in Wonderland
simple_desc: Alice stumbles into the world of Wonderland. Will she get home? Not if the Queen of Hearts has her way.

title: One Hundred and One Dalmatians
simple_desc: When a litter of Dalmatian puppies are abducted by the minions of Cruella De Vil, the owners must find them before she uses them for a diabolical fashion statement.
stars: ['Rod Taylor', 'Betty Lou Gerson', "J. Pat O'Malley", 'Martha Wentworth']

title: The Simpsons Movie
simple_desc: After Homer pollutes the town's water supply, Springfield is encased in a gigantic dome by the EPA and the Simpsons are declared fugitives.

title: Bambi
simple_desc: The story of a young deer growing up in the forest.
directors: ['James Algar', 'Samuel Armstrong', 'David Hand', 'Graham Heid', 'Bill Roberts', 'Paul Satterfield', 'Norman Wright', 'Arthur Davis', 'Clyde Geronimi']

title: The Brave Little Toaster
simple_desc: A group of dated appliances embark on a journey to the city to find their master after being abandoned in a cabin in the woods.

title: Anomalisa
simple_desc: A man crippled by the mundanity of his life experiences something out of the ordinary.

title: Pom Poko
simple_desc: A community of magical shape-shifting raccoon dogs struggle to prevent their forest home from being destroyed by urban development.

title: Shaun the Sheep Movie
simple_desc: When Shaun decides to take the day off and have some fun, he gets a little more action than he bargained for. A mix up with the Farmer, a caravan and a very steep hill lead them all to the Big City and it's up to Shaun and the flock to return everyone safely to the green grass of home.

title: The Super Mario Bros. Movie
simple_desc: A plumber named Mario travels through an underground labyrinth with his brother, Luigi, trying to save a captured princess.

title: Cars
simple_desc: On the way to the biggest race of his life, a hotshot rookie race car gets stranded in a rundown town and learns that winning isn't everything in life.
stars: ['Owen Wilson', 'Bonnie Hunt', 'Paul Newman', 'Larry the Cable Guy']

title: Encanto
simple_desc: A Colombian teenage girl has to face the frustration of being the only member of her family without magical powers.

title: A Bug's Life
simple_desc: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

title: Rango
simple_desc: Rango is an ordinary chameleon who accidentally winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in desperate need of a new sheriff.

title: Treasure Planet
simple_desc: In this science fiction rendering of the classic novel "Treasure Island", Jim Hawkins (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) is a rebellious teen seen by the world as an aimless slacker. After he receives ...                See full summary »

title: The Croods
simple_desc: After their cave is destroyed, a caveman family must trek through an unfamiliar fantastical world with the help of an inventive boy.

title: The Prince of Egypt
simple_desc: Egyptian Prince Moses learns of his identity as a Hebrew and his destiny to become the chosen deliverer of his people.

title: Monsters University
simple_desc: A look at the relationship between Mike Wazowski (Billy Crystal) and James P. "Sully" Sullivan (John Goodman) during their days at Monsters University, when they weren't necessarily the best of friends.

title: Kung Fu Panda 2
simple_desc: Po and his friends fight to stop a peacock villain from conquering China with a deadly new weapon, but first the Dragon Warrior must come to terms with his past.

title: Sleeping Beauty
simple_desc: After being snubbed by the royal family, a malevolent fairy places a curse on a princess which only a prince can break, along with the help of three good fairies.

title: The Book of Life
simple_desc: Manolo, a young man who is torn between fulfilling the expectations of his family and following his heart, embarks on an adventure that spans three fantastic worlds where he must face his greatest fears.

title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
simple_desc: A wild stallion is captured by humans and slowly loses the will to resist training, yet, throughout his struggles for freedom, the stallion refuses to let go of the hope of one day returning home to his herd.

title: Rise of the Guardians
simple_desc: When the evil spirit Pitch launches an assault on Earth, the Immortal Guardians team up to protect the innocence of children all around the world.

title: Wish Dragon
simple_desc: Determined teen Din is longing to reconnect with his childhood best friend when he meets a wish-granting dragon who shows him the magic of possibilities.

title: The Fox and the Hound
simple_desc: A fox named Tod and a hound named Copper vow to be best friends forever. But as Copper grows into a hunting dog, their unlikely friendship faces the ultimate test.

title: The Transformers: The Movie
simple_desc: The Autobots must stop a colossal planet consuming robot who goes after the Autobot Matrix of Leadership. At the same time, they must defend themselves against an all-out attack from the Decepticons.

title: Dumbo
simple_desc: Ridiculed because of his enormous ears, a young circus elephant is assisted by a mouse to achieve his full potential.
directors: ['Samuel Armstrong', 'Norman Ferguson', 'Wilfred Jackson', 'Jack Kinney', 'Bill Roberts', 'Ben Sharpsteen', 'John Elliotte']

title: The Witcher: Nightmare of the Wolf
simple_desc: Escaping from poverty to become a witcher, Vesemir slays monsters for coin and glory, but when a new menace rises, he must face the demons of his past.

title: Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children
simple_desc: An ex-mercenary is forced out of isolation when three mysterious men kidnap and brainwash the city's children afflicted with the Geostigma disease.

title: Metropolis
simple_desc: Kenichi and his uncle Shunsaku Ban must find the mystery behind robot girl Tima.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection "F"
simple_desc: One peaceful day on Earth, two remnants of Freeza's army named Sorube and Tagoma arrive searching for the Dragon Balls with the aim of reviving Freeza. They succeed, and Freeza subsequently seeks revenge on the Saiya-jin.

title: Sing
simple_desc: In a city of humanoid animals, a hustling theater impresario's attempt to save his theater with a singing competition becomes grander than he anticipates even as its finalists find that their lives will never be the same.

title: DC League of Super-Pets
simple_desc: Krypto the Super-Dog and Superman are inseparable best friends, sharing the same superpowers and fighting crime side by side in Metropolis. However, Krypto must master his own powers for a rescue mission when Superman is kidnapped.

title: The Princess and the Frog
simple_desc: A waitress, desperate to fulfill her dreams as a restaurant owner, is set on a journey to turn a frog prince back into a human being, but she has to face the same problem after she kisses him.

title: Enchanted
simple_desc: A young maiden in a land called Andalasia, who is prepared to be wed, is sent away to New York City by an evil Queen, where she falls in love with a lawyer.

title: Anastasia
simple_desc: The last surviving child of the Russian Royal Family joins two con men to reunite with her grandmother, the Dowager Empress, while the undead Rasputin seeks her death.

title: Chicken Run
simple_desc: When a cockerel apparently flies into a chicken farm, the chickens see him as an opportunity to escape their evil owners.

title: Brave
simple_desc: Determined to make her own path in life, Princess Merida defies a custom that brings chaos to her kingdom. Granted one wish, Merida must rely on her bravery and her archery skills to undo a beastly curse.

title: Kung Fu Panda 3
simple_desc: Continuing his "legendary adventures of awesomeness", Po must face two hugely epic, but different threats: one supernatural and the other a little closer to home.

title: The AristoCats
simple_desc: With the help of a smooth talking tomcat, a family of Parisian felines set to inherit a fortune from their owner try to make it back home after a jealous butler kidnaps them and leaves them in the country.

title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
simple_desc: SpongeBob SquarePants takes leave from the town of Bikini Bottom in order to track down King Neptune's stolen crown.

title: The Sword in the Stone
simple_desc: A poor boy named Arthur learns the power of love, kindness, knowledge and bravery with the help of a wizard called Merlin in the path to become one of the most beloved kings in English history.

title: Winnie the Pooh
simple_desc: While searching for honey, Pooh and his friends embark on an adventure to find Eeyore's missing tail and rescue Christopher Robin from an unknown monster called The Backson.

title: The Great Mouse Detective
simple_desc: Basil, the rodent Sherlock Holmes, investigates the kidnapping of a toy maker and uncovers its link to his archenemy, Professor Ratigan.

title: The Cat Returns
simple_desc: After helping a cat, a seventeen-year-old girl finds herself involuntarily engaged to a cat Prince in a magical world where her only hope of freedom lies with a dapper cat statuette come to life.

title: Balto
simple_desc: An outcast Husky risks his life with other sled dogs to prevent a deadly epidemic from ravaging Nome, Alaska.

title: Fantasia 2000
simple_desc: An update of the original film with new interpretations of great works of classical music.
directors: ['James Algar', 'Gaëtan Brizzi', 'Paul Brizzi', 'Hendel Butoy', 'Francis Glebas', 'Eric Goldberg', 'Don Hahn', 'Pixote Hunt']

title: Dragon Ball Z: Battle of Gods
simple_desc: The Z-Fighters must contend with Lord Beerus, the God of Destruction, but only a God can fight a God, and none of them are Gods. However with the creation of the Super Saiyan God, will the Z-Fighters be able to defeat Lord Beerus?

title: Arthur Christmas
simple_desc: Santa's clumsy son Arthur sets out on a mission with Grandsanta to give out a present they misplaced to a young girl in less than two hours.

title: Turning Red
simple_desc: A 13-year-old girl named Meilin turns into a giant red panda whenever she gets too excited.

title: Hotel Transylvania
simple_desc: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's teenaged daughter.

title: Ralph Breaks the Internet
simple_desc: Six years after the events of "Wreck-It Ralph," Ralph and Vanellope, now friends, discover a wi-fi router in their arcade, leading them into a new adventure.
stars: ['John C. Reilly', 'Sarah Silverman', 'Gal Gadot', 'Taraji P. Henson']

title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
simple_desc: A deformed bell-ringer must assert his independence from a vicious government minister in order to help his friend, a gypsy dancer.

title: The Sea Beast
simple_desc: When a young girl stows away on the ship of a legendary sea monster hunter, they launch an epic journey into uncharted waters - and make history to boot.

title: Chip 'n Dale: Rescue Rangers
simple_desc: Thirty years after their popular television show ended, chipmunks Chip and Dale live very different lives. When a cast member from the original series mysteriously disappears, the pair must reunite to save their friend.
A rag doll that awakens in a postapocalyptic future holds the key to humanity's salvation.

title: Ron's Gone Wrong
simple_desc: The story of Barney, an awkward middle-schooler and Ron, his new walking, talking, digitally-connected device. Ron's malfunctions set against the backdrop of the social media age launch them on a journey to learn about true friendship.

title: Bedknobs and Broomsticks
simple_desc: An apprentice witch, three kids and a cynical magician conman search for the missing component to a magic spell to be used in the defense of Britain in World War II.

title: A Scanner Darkly
simple_desc: An undercover cop in a not-too-distant future becomes involved with a dangerous new drug and begins to lose his own identity as a result.

title: ParaNorman
simple_desc: A misunderstood boy takes on ghosts, zombies and grown-ups to save his town from a centuries-old curse.

title: Abominable
simple_desc: Three teenagers must help a Yeti return to his family while avoiding a wealthy man and a zoologist who want him for their own needs.

title: The Peanuts Movie
simple_desc: Snoopy embarks upon his greatest mission as he and his team take to the skies to pursue their archnemesis, while his best pal Charlie Brown begins his own epic quest back home to win the love of his life.

title: Rio
simple_desc: When Blu, a domesticated macaw from small-town Minnesota, meets the fiercely independent Jewel, he takes off on an adventure to Rio de Janeiro with the bird of his dreams.

title: Madagascar
simple_desc: A group of animals who have spent all their life in a New York zoo end up in the jungles of Madagascar, and must adjust to living in the wild.

title: Atlantis: The Lost Empire
simple_desc: A young linguist named Milo Thatch joins an intrepid group of explorers to find the mysterious lost continent of Atlantis.

title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
simple_desc: A local scientist is often regarded as a failure until he invents a machine that can make food fall from the sky. But little does he know that things are about to take a turn for the worst.

title: The Croods: A New Age
simple_desc: The prehistoric family the Croods are challenged by a rival family the Bettermans, who claim to be better and more evolved.

title: A Goofy Movie
simple_desc: When Max makes a preposterous promise to a girl he has a crush on, his chances to fulfilling it seem hopeless when he is dragged onto a cross-country trip with his embarrassing father, Goofy.

title: The Road to El Dorado
simple_desc: Two swindlers get their hands on a map to the fabled city of gold, El Dorado.

title: The Rescuers
simple_desc: Two mice of the Rescue Aid Society search for a little girl kidnapped by unscrupulous treasure hunters.

title: Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
simple_desc: When Sid's attempt to adopt three dinosaur eggs gets him abducted by their real mother to an underground lost world, his friends attempt to rescue him.

title: An American Tail
simple_desc: While emigrating to the United States, a young Russian mouse gets separated from his family and must relocate them while trying to survive in a new country.

title: Legend of the Guardians: The Owls of Ga'Hoole
simple_desc: When a young owl is abducted by an evil Owl army, he must escape with new-found friends and seek the legendary Guardians to stop the menace.

title: Charlotte's Web
simple_desc: Wilbur is a farm pig who's terrified that he'll end up on the dinner table. His friend Charlotte, a charming spider, comes to his rescue. She weaves words into her web, convincing the farmer that Wilbur is too special a pig to kill.

title: Frankenweenie
simple_desc: When a boy's beloved dog passes away suddenly, he attempts to bring the animal back to life through a powerful science experiment.

title: The Lion King
simple_desc: After the murder of his father, a young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

title: The Bad Guys
simple_desc: To avoid prison, a gang of notorious animal criminals pretends to seek being rehabilitated, only for their leader to realize that he genuinely wants to change his ways.

title: Frozen II
simple_desc: Anna, Elsa, Kristoff, Olaf and Sven leave Arendelle to travel to an ancient, autumn-bound forest of an enchanted land. They set out to find the origin of Elsa's powers in order to save their kingdom.

title: Bolt
simple_desc: The canine star of a fictional sci-fi/action show that believes his powers are real embarks on a cross country trek to save his co-star from a threat he believes is just as real.

title: Horton Hears a Who!
simple_desc: Horton the Elephant struggles to protect a microscopic community from his neighbors who refuse to believe it exists.

title: Meet the Robinsons
simple_desc: Lewis is a brilliant inventor who meets mysterious stranger named Wilbur Robinson, whisking Lewis away in a time machine and together they team up to track down Bowler Hat Guy in a showdown that ends with an unexpected twist of fate.

title: Brother Bear
simple_desc: When a young Inuit hunter needlessly kills a bear, he is magically changed into a bear himself as punishment with a talkative cub being his only guide to changing back.

title: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted
simple_desc: The Madagascar animals join a struggling European circus to get back to New York, but find themselves being pursued by a psychotic animal-control officer.

title: Spies in Disguise
simple_desc: When the world's best spy is turned into a pigeon, he must rely on his nerdy tech officer to save the world.

title: Storks
simple_desc: Storks have moved on from delivering babies to packages. But when an order for a baby appears, the best delivery stork must scramble to fix the error by delivering the baby.

title: Mr. Peabody & Sherman
simple_desc: The time-travelling adventures of an advanced canine and his adopted son, as they endeavor to fix a time rift they created.

title: The Rescuers Down Under
simple_desc: R.A.S. agents Miss Bianca and Bernard race to Australia to save a little boy and a rare golden eagle from a murderous poacher.

title: Ice Age: The Meltdown
simple_desc: Manny, Sid and Diego discover that the ice age is coming to an end, and join everybody for a journey to higher ground. On the trip, they discover that Manny is not in fact the last of the woolly mammoths.

title: The Boxtrolls
simple_desc: A young orphaned boy raised by underground cave-dwelling trash collectors tries to save his friends from an evil exterminator.

title: A Christmas Carol
simple_desc: An animated retelling of Charles Dickens' classic novel about a Victorian-era miser taken on a journey of self-redemption, courtesy of several mysterious Christmas apparitions.

title: Beavis and Butt-Head Do America
simple_desc: Our intrepid adolescent heroes wake up to find their beloved television stolen, and embark on an epic journey across America to recover it, and, who knows, maybe even score.

title: DuckTales the Movie: Treasure of the Lost Lamp
simple_desc: Scrooge McDuck takes Huey, Dewey, and Louie to Egypt to find a pyramid and magic lamp.

title: Cars 3
simple_desc: Lightning McQueen sets out to prove to a new generation of racers that he's still the best race car in the world.

title: Over the Hedge
simple_desc: A scheming raccoon fools a mismatched family of forest creatures into helping him repay a debt of food, by invading the new suburban sprawl that popped up while they were hibernating...and learns a lesson about family himself.

title: Pocahontas
simple_desc: An English soldier and the daughter of an Algonquin chief share a romance when English colonists invade seventeenth century Virginia.

title: The Good Dinosaur
simple_desc: In a world where dinosaurs and humans live side-by-side, an Apatosaurus named Arlo makes an unlikely human friend.

title: Ferdinand
simple_desc: After Ferdinand, a bull with a big heart, is mistaken for a dangerous beast, he is captured and torn from his home. Determined to return to his family, he rallies a misfit team on the ultimate adventure.

title: Vivo
simple_desc: Vivo, Sony Pictures Animation's first-ever musical adventure featuring all-new original songs from Lin-Manuel Miranda, will take audiences on an epic adventure to gorgeous and vibrant locations never before seen in animation.
stars: ['Lin-Manuel Miranda', 'Ynairaly Simo', 'Zoe Saldana', 'Juan de Marcos González']

title: Surf's Up
simple_desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the annual Penguin World Surfing Championship, and its newest participant, up-and-comer Cody Maverick.

title: All Dogs Go to Heaven
simple_desc: A canine angel, Charlie, sneaks back to earth from heaven but ends up befriending an orphan girl who can speak to animals. In the process, Charlie learns that friendship is the most heavenly gift of all.

title: James and the Giant Peach
simple_desc: An orphan who lives with his two cruel aunts befriends anthropomorphic bugs who live inside a giant peach, and they embark on a journey to New York City.

title: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
simple_desc: The sailor of legend is framed by the goddess Eris for the theft of the Book of Peace and must travel to her realm at the end of the world to retrieve it and save the life of his childhood friend Prince Proteus.

title: Leap!
simple_desc: An orphan girl dreams of becoming a ballerina and flees her rural Brittany for Paris, where she passes for someone else and accedes to the position of pupil at the Grand Opera House.

title: Teen Titans GO! To the Movies
simple_desc: A villain's maniacal plan for world domination sidetracks five teenage superheroes who dream of Hollywood stardom.

title: Missing Link
simple_desc: Mr. Link recruits explorer Sir Lionel Frost to help find his long-lost relatives in the fabled valley of Shangri-La. Along with adventurer Adelina Fortnight, this trio of explorers travel the world to help their new friend.

title: The Pirates! Band of Misfits
simple_desc: Pirate Captain sets out on a mission to defeat his rivals Black Bellamy and Cutlass Liz for the Pirate of the year Award. The quest takes Captain and his crew from the shores of Blood Island to the foggy streets of Victorian London.

title: Kingsglaive: Final Fantasy XV
simple_desc: King Regis, who oversees the land of Lucis, commands his army of soldiers to protect the kingdom from the Niflheim empire's plans to steal the sacred crystal which gives Lucis its magic and power.

title: A Monster in Paris
simple_desc: A 3D-animated movie set in Paris in the year 1910 and centered on a monster who lives in a garden and his love for a beautiful, young singer.

title: Puss in Boots
simple_desc: An outlaw cat, his childhood egg-friend, and a seductive thief kitty set out in search for the eggs of the fabled Golden Goose to clear his name, restore his lost honor, and regain the trust of his mother and town.

title: Home
simple_desc: An alien on the run from his own people makes friends with a girl. He tries to help her on her quest, but can be an interference.

title: The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part
simple_desc: It's been five years since everything was awesome and the citizens are facing a huge new threat: Lego Duplo invaders from outer space, wrecking everything faster than they can rebuild.

title: Epic
simple_desc: A teenager finds herself transported to a deep forest setting where a battle between the forces of good and evil is taking place. She bands together with a ragtag group of characters to save their world--and ours.
